entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 3:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -8.1°C
Wind: WSW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
